changelog:
## BurgTV v1.0.95

### Bug Fixes
- Fix: Search requires only 1 BACK press to close (was 3 with keyboard, 2 without)
- Fix: LazyGrid crash on duplicate channel IDs
- Fix: Catch-up playback CDN headers

### Security
- EncryptedSharedPreferences for PremiumManager
- PIN rate limiting (5 attempts + 5min lockout)

### Translations
- 725 Italian strings added
- 13 languages fully translated
